CustomField.description: List of Resource fields (fully-qualified API names/paths) to display on columns for Resource lookup pop-up in new Timecard UI. Recommend at most 4 fields/columns. Default value: Name, Region__r.Name, Practice__r.Name, Group__r.Name
CustomField.inlineHelpText: List of Resource fields (fully-qualified API names/paths) to display on columns for Resource lookup pop-up in new Timecard UI. Recommend at most 4 fields/columns. Default value: Name, Region__r.Name, Practice__r.Name, Group__r.Name
CustomField.label: Resource lookup columns
